00051     void PutChar(char ch);      // Write "ch" to the console display, 
00052                                 // and return immediately.  "writeHandler" 
00053                                 // is called when the I/O completes. 
00054 
00055     char GetChar();             // Poll the console input.  If a char is 
00056                                 // available, return it.  Otherwise, return EOF.
00057                                 // "readHandler" is called whenever there is 
00058                                 // a char to be gotten

00061     void DisableInterrupt();
